636650.name: Flat Heroes Demo
636650.description: When was the last time you felt like a hero? Flat Heroes rewards you with that good old feeling of surviving impossible levels alongside a smooth modern design with a minimalist style. With a simple set of movements — Run. Jump. Dash. Attack. — and delightful controls, Flat Heroes encourages you to stylishly navigate and survive over 300 handcrafted levels, destroy the most epic bosses around and truly be the two-dimensional hero (or heroes!) you’ve always dreamed you could be.
636650.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 保加利亚语, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 丹麦语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 日语, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 瑞典语, 泰语, 捷克语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语
